extends ICoreService

    • Method Detail

      • createJob

        JobDefinition createJob(String name,
                        String group,
                        String clazz,
                        String handler,
                        String engine,
                        String description,
                        String expression,
                        boolean singleton)
                 throws SchedulerException
        Creates the job with parameters.
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        group - the group
        clazz - the job class
        handler - the handler
        engine - the engine type
        description - the description
        expression - the expression
        singleton - the singleton
        Returns:
        the job definition
        Throws:
        SchedulerException - the scheduler exception

      • existsJob

        boolean existsJob(String name)
           throws SchedulerException
        Checks whether a job with the given name already exist
        Parameters:
        name - the name
        Returns:
        true if exists and false otherwise
        Throws:
        SchedulerException - in case of an internal error
